div.p: This variable is the unique Part D contract identifier for the beneficiaryâ€™s Part D plan of record for the year. CMS assigns an identifier to each contract that a Part D plan has with CMS. If the beneficiary was enrolled in more than one plan during the year, this is the contract number for the Part D plan in which the beneficiary was enrolled at the end of the year. The first character of the plan contract ID is a letter representing the type of plan. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/plancntrctrec_id
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

description.value: This variable is the unique Part D contract identifier for the beneficiary’s Part D plan of record for the year. CMS assigns an identifier to each contract that a Part D plan has with CMS. If the beneficiary was enrolled in more than one plan during the year, this is the contract number for the Part D plan in which the beneficiary was enrolled at the end of the year. The first character of the plan contract ID is a letter representing the type of plan. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/plan_cntrct_rec_id
